title: when suggesting `?Sized`, don't suggest indirection in where clauses

labels.name: A-diagnostics
labels.description: Area: Messages for errors, warnings, and lints

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: D-papercut
labels.description: Diagnostic error that needs small tweaks

labels.name: D-invalid-suggestion
labels.description: A structured suggestion resulting in incorrect code

body:
Given the following code: [(playground)](https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=stable&mode=debug&edition=2018&gist=dbe9b082e6a0b69cbe341fadd2ea76e7)

```rust
struct A<T>(T) where T: Send;
struct B(A<[u8]>);
```

The current output is:

```
error[E0277]: the size for values of type `[u8]` cannot be known at compilation time
 --> src/lib.rs:2:10
  |
1 | struct A<T>(T) where T: Send;
  |          - required by this bound in `A`
2 | struct B(A<[u8]>);
  |          ^^^^^^^ doesn't have a size known at compile-time
  |
  = help: the trait `Sized` is not implemented for `[u8]`
help: you could relax the implicit `Sized` bound on `T` if it were used through indirection like `&T` or `Box<T>`
 --> src/lib.rs:1:10
  |
1 | struct A<T>(T) where T: Send;
  |          ^  -        - ...if indirection were used here: `Box<T>`
  |          |  |
  |          |  ...if indirection were used here: `Box<T>`
  |          this could be changed to `T: ?Sized`...
```

<!-- The following is not always necessary. -->
Ideally the output should look like:

```
error[E0277]: the size for values of type `[u8]` cannot be known at compilation time
 --> src/lib.rs:2:10
  |
1 | struct A<T>(T) where T: Send;
  |          - required by this bound in `A`
2 | struct B(A<[u8]>);
  |          ^^^^^^^ doesn't have a size known at compile-time
  |
  = help: the trait `Sized` is not implemented for `[u8]`
help: you could relax the implicit `Sized` bound on `T` if it were used through indirection like `&T` or `Box<T>`
 --> src/lib.rs:1:10
  |
1 | struct A<T>(T) where T: Send;
  |          ^  -
  |          |  |
  |          |  ...if indirection were used here: `Box<T>`
  |          this could be changed to `T: ?Sized`...
```

The visitor that collects bare type parameters should skip where clauses. I can work on this in an in-progress pull request where I'm making other improvements to unsized suggestions.

@rustbot claim
@rustbot label +A-traits +A-typesystem +D-invalid-suggestion +D-papercut
